MSG.ShortText: The configuration of log device $VOLUME_ID$ is corrupted
An error occurred while accessing a volume
MSG.Description: An error occurred during a write or read access to the '$VOLUME_TYPE$ ' volume with the ID '$VOLUME_ID$' at position '$BLOCK_NO$' with ' $NUMBER$' page(s). The reported cause of the error was ' $ERRORTEXT$ '.

MSG.ShortText: Multiple attempts to read a volume failed
MSG.Description: While attempting to read the requested ' $NUMBER$' page(s) blockwise from the '$VOLUME_TYPE$' volume with the ID ' $VOLUME_ID$ ' at position '$BLOCK_NO$ ', the system required ' $NUMBER1$' read attempts before it could read the desired page(s) without error.

MSG.ShortText: Consistency check on read page failed
MSG.Description:
The post-read consistency check found an error on the page. The bad page was read from the '$VOLUME_TYPE$' volume with the ID ' $VOLUME_ID$ ' from position '$BLOCK_NO$ '.
As it may be necessary for development support to do an in-depth analysis of the page, the defective data page has been stored in the database run directory.

MSG.ShortText: Failed consistency check on read page
The read operation has been terminated due to a corrupt page

MSG.Description: The '$VOLUME_TYPE$' volume with the ID '$VOLUME_ID$' is offline.

MSG.ShortText: Current operational state of the data area
MSG.Description: The data area consists of '$NUMBER$' volumes with a total of '$NUMBER1$' pages. Of these, '$NUMBER2$' volumes are currently online.

MSG.ShortText: Consistency check on a page to be written failed
